posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
With 13 SD I can summon an exact duplicate of myself to fight with me and 16 BG level I get a summon fiend feat.
​Also there is a nice Blackguard quest on my server that gets you a nice Bastard sword.

Thoughts??

David

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content: Probably Ftr10/SD14/BG16 is better to get a slightly better skill total and daze DC with the 11th fighter level of little value (BG gets both concentration and discipline as class skills).  The last level of BG should be taken as late as possible for the best taunt dump.  If you want access to the fiend earlier, then go with Ftr10/SD13/BG17.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Ftr10/SD14/BG16 sound good. I can always relevel after he hits level 40

Thanks for the advice

David

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content: N CBC is not working for me anymore

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
Delete your copy and download a fresh one.  If you still have the zip in your downloads folder, decompress a new copy.

The first thing you need to do when you decide to build a new design is save the spreadsheet AS A NEW NAME immediately when it opens up.  Always work from from a blank workbook.  That way, if you accidentally corrupt it, the saved workbook will be the only one that doesn't work.  Follow my tips in one of your other topics to economize the effort you spend devising a build.

What version of Excel do you have loaded on your PC, David?  Mine is pretty old so I save the workbooks as .xls (MSOffice 2002) rather than .xlsx (that's a MSOffice 2007 version).

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Make the original read-only, which will force you to save it before editing, like Hip advised.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content: I figured it out. I had to unprotect it

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
KidMiracleman wrote:
I figured it out. I had to unprotect it
Just make sure to protect it again before trying to build or you will end up with another corrupt file.  CBC was designed to make calculations only with protected cells.
